title: Warm Chocolate Sauce
introduction: This luscious warm chocolate sauce is made richer with the addition of espresso, which enhances the chocolate's depth of flavor. Perfect for drizzling over ice cream, semifreddo, or simple cakes, this versatile sauce can elevate a wide variety of desserts.
ingredients: 8 ounces bittersweet or semisweet chocolate, chopped
instructions: Place the chocolate and cream in the top of a double boiler or in a heatproof bowl set over a pan of simmering water.
Let stand until the chocolate is softened.
Serve warm or transfer to an airtight container and store in the refrigerator up to 3 days.
variations: Warm Mocha Sauce: Stir in 1 teaspoon instant espresso powder with the chocolate.
